info.abstract: The Text Converter component converts various types of text file to other text file types.
info.description: This component allows you to convert text file from one type to another. Currently you can use this component to convert a XML, tab-delimited, or csv file into a tab-delimited or csv file.

ul.li: A text file to be converted.
Text file converted to a new format.
Input file type - XML, Tab-Delimitied, or CSV
Output file type - Tab-Delimited or CSV
